remarks: The "inclusion functor" from a subcategory of a category into the category itself.  (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2020.)
statement:
inclfusubc.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
inclfusubc.s $e |- S = ( C |`cat J ) $.
inclfusubc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
inclfusubc.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( _I |` B ) ) $.
inclfusubc.g $e |- ( ph -> G = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( _I |` ( x J y ) ) ) ) $.
inclfusubc $p |- ( ph -> F ( S Func C ) G ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d S x y $.
